alert.note: Alert for Lake (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 20 at 8:58PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following county, Lake. * WHEN...Until midnight EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 857 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen earlier today across portions of the Advisory. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area through late evening. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Leesburg, Eustis, Tavares, Lady Lake, Mount Dora, Groveland, Mascotte, Howey-In-the-hills, Lake Harris, Lake Griffin, Ferndale, Lisbon, Emeralda, The Villages, Clermont, Fruitland Park, Leesburg Airport, Mid Florida Lakes, Minneola and Umatilla. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
